title: 复活图腾
txt_content:
如何给复活图腾加上这个效果:
在死亡后重生的一瞬间血量回满

replies.author: TNTobsidian
replies.txt_content:
...得了
创建记分板scoreboard objectives add a minecraft.used:minecraft.totem_of_undying
tag @r add test1
scoreboard players test @a[tag=test1] a 1 *
tag @a[tag=test1] add test2
链无条件：tag @a remove test1
effect @a[tag=test2] instant_health 秒数 255 true
scoreboard players reset @a a
tag @a remove test2
秒数根据回血大小，再参考https://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.c ... 4%E6%B2%BB%E7%96%97
决定时间
不会问我

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 黑茶RGO 于 2020-3-20 22:49 编辑 

创建计分板：
scoreboard objectives add fuhuo minecraft.used:minecraft.totem_of_undying

然后高频两条指令：
effect give @a[score_fuhuo_min=1] minecraft:instant_health 1 50 true
scoreboard players set @a[score_fuhuo_min=1] fuhuo 0
如果是死亡后（进入了红色死亡界面）再满血复活的话，先创建计分板
scoreboard objectives add fuhuo deathCount

再高频:
effect give @e[type=player,score_fuhuo_min=1] minecraft:instant_health 1 50 true
scoreboard players set @e[type=player,score_fuhuo_min=1] fuhuo 0
